DOC.brief_summary: To optimize food security quilombolas community high prevalence food insecurity obesity , present study propose test multi-sector intervention include agriculture sector , health professional family member community , base promotion traditional food practice , health eat enforceability human right adequate food .
DOC.brief_title: Food Nutrition Education Quilombolas Communities With Food Insecurity : Multi-sector Intervention
DOC.detailed_description: The present study propose develop nutrition education strategy multi-sector intervention order promote consumption healthy food improvement health status quilombola population.This non-randomized cluster trial four quilombolas community Southern Brazil ( Passo Lorenço , Algodão , Serrinha Cristal Nova Palma ) , combine qualitative quantitative methodology .
DOC.criteria: Quilombolas certify community Rio Grande Sul , Brazil , high prevalence food insecurity obesity . Community leader interest study intervention .
